data.text: @Joyce_Motherof5 Hi Joyce! We are so sorry for any frustrations. We would be happy to look into this for you. Please send us a DM with your details. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@MikeDeV79970383 Hi Mike! If you need assistance, please send us a DM and the next available agent will assist you. -H
@lala_lalauren Hi Lauren. It appears your issue was resolved. (: Thanks for reaching out. -HW
@lala_lalauren Hi Lauren. Thanks for reaching out. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM and the next available agent will assist. -HW
@getroxyxyz Hi Roxanne. Thanks for reaching out! If you need assistance, please send us a DM and the next available agent will assist. -HW
@dctinman7 Hi there. Thanks for reaching out. Please send us a DM and the next available agent will assist you with your cancellation. -HW
@maria_abbe Hi Maria! Thanks for reaching out! So sorry to hear that your flight was disrupted. If you need assistance, please send us a DM and the next available agent will assist you. -HW
@SkyMan6464 Hi, there! Thanks for the suggestion! We will forward this to our Planning Team for future consideration! -N

@dbk26364327 Hi there, thank you for letting us know. We apologize for your experience. This matter will be shared with the appropriate department leadership as we are committed to improving and providing a satisfactory travel experience for all of our customers. -N

@YetterSarah Hi, Sarah. We apologize for the delay in response as well as to hear of your experience. All inquiries are answered in the order received. Please feel free to DM us with your itinerary number and email address on file if you still need assistance. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@CMFSterling Hi, Corey. So sorry for the delay in response and to hear of your experience. We strive always to keep our schedule as originally planned. If you are needing assistance, please feel free to DM us with your itinerary number and email address on file. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@ZaneUllman Hi, Zane. So sorry for our delayed response and to hear of your experience. If you are needing assistance, please feel free to DM us your itinerary number and email address on file. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N
@khateebh08 Hi, Haya. We are sorry to hear of your experience. This will be forwarded to the appropriate management teams. Thank you for letting us know. -N

@ernie_bags Hi, there. We are sorry to hear of your experience. If you need further assistance, please feel free to DM us with your itinerary number and email address on file for review. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N
@CarlosD75982197 Hi, there! Thank you for the suggestion! We will forward this to our Planning Team for review! -N

@sydneeruena Hi, Syd. We apologize for the delayed in response and to hear of your experience. If you are needing any assistance, please feel free to DM us with your itinerary number and email address on file for review. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@thiccbait Hi, there. So sorry for the delayed response and for your experience. If you need assistance, please feel free to DM us with your itinerary number and email address on file for review. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@momaxme Hi, Monica! So sorry for the delayed response and for your experience with your flight disruption. We are so happy to hear that you were assisted! Thanks for letting us know about Fran! We will forward this to the appropriate management teams to let them know! -N

@livehugefactor Hi, Kyleigh. We apologize for the delayed response and for your experience. If assistance is needed, DM us your itinerary number and email address on file. Thank you! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@megmmurray Hi, there. So sorry for the delayed response and for your experience. If you are needing assistance, please feel free to DM us with your itinerary number and email address on file. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N
@rrauscher Hi, Richard! We will forward your request to our Planning Team! Thank you so much for your input! -N

@Eggali88 Hi, Alicia. We apologize for the delayed response and to hear of your experience. We are not affiliated with any other airlines so booking you on with them is not an option. So sorry for any confusion. If you need assistance, please feel free to DM us. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@DanDeKoning Hi, Dan. So sorry for the delayed response and to hear of your wife's experience. Please have her DM us through her own social media account with her confirmation number and email address on file so that we may review. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@govindrao54 Hi, Govindrao. We are so sorry for the delayed response and for your experience. If you need any assistance, please feel free to DM us with your itinerary number and email address on file. Thank you. https://t.co/VDWSImMqPa -N

@ParsonsPhysics Hi, there! So sorry for the delayed response and for your experience. The desk is to open 2 hours prior to departure time. We apologize if that indeed did not happen for your flight. Please feel free to DM us if you have further questions. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@shelbylwhite1 Hi, Shelby! So sorry for the delayed response and for your experience. If you are needing any assistance, please DM us with your itinerary number and email address on file. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@catswithnobacon Hi, there! We apologize for the delayed response. If you are still in need of assistance, please DM us with your itinerary number and email address on file for review. Thanks! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@EspiesMom Hi, Rach. Sorry for the delayed response. All routes are current through mid-May 2023. Offered flights will be shown in bold. If a date is not shown in bold then we are not offering a flight for your route and/or date of interest. DM us with questions. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N
@ConnaBond Hi, Conna. So sorry to hear of their experience. If they need assistance, please have them reach out on their own social media account so that we may assist. Thank you! -N

@MaxMuhlenkamp Hi, Max. So sorry for the delay in response and to hear of your experience. Please feel free to DM us with your itinerary number and email address on file if you need assistance. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@mariballs Hi, Maribella. We apologize for the delayed response and so sorry to hear of your experience. If you are needing assistance, please feel free to DM us with your confirmation number and email address on file. Thanks! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@ChrisMi86944767 Hi, Chris. We apologize for the delayed response and for any confusion. There is indeed an overweight charge for checked bags over 40 pounds. This information is disclosed on our website. We apologize for any confusion. DM us if you have questions. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@tcashballer21 Hi, there. So sorry for the delayed response and to hear of your experience. Please feel free to DM us with your itinerary number and email address on file for review. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@JustenOslund7 Hi, Justen. So sorry to hear of your delayed flight and your experience. If you are still needing assistance, please feel free to DM us with your confirmation number and email address on file for review. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@BlondeBitch_Xo Hi, there! So sorry for the delayed response. Points are automatically added, as long as you were logged in when booking your reservation, 3-5 days post travel. Feel free to DM us with your itinerary number and email address if you need assistance. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@eric_dolecki Hi, Eric. So sorry for the delay in response. If you need any assistance, please feel free to DM us with your itinerary number, email address on file, and your specific request. Thank you! -N

@GaryEscoe Hi, Gary. We apologize for any frustration and the delay in response as we are working through an unprecedented number of requests. If you are needing assistance, please feel free to DM us with your confirmation number and email address on file. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@GiGiSoChi Hi, Gigi. We are sorry that you feel that way and for the delayed response. All of the information is disclosed in our Terms and Conditions. We apologize for any frustration and confusion. Please feel free to DM us if you have any questions. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N
@CowboysfanG8 Hi, Ginny! So sorry for the delayed response. If you still need assistance, please DM us with your confirmation number and email address on file for review. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N
@nmcshinsky89 Hi, Nate! Our calendars are current through mid-May 2023! Please feel free to DM us if you have any questions! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@sumthack Hi, there! Sorry to hear of your delay and for the late response. If you need assistance at all, please feel free to DM us with your confirmation number and email address on file for review. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

data.text: @LoriJacobsenrn Hi, Lori! We do not fly in/out of Russia. An airport there shares the same airport code IWA. Phoenix-Mesa Gateway also uses for AZA. Sorry for any confusion! -N

@pipinghottakes1 Hi, there! So sorry to hear of your experience and the delayed response. If you are needing assistance, please DM us with your confirmation number and email address on file with your specific request. Thanks! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@w_i_l_l_a Hi, there! So sorry for the delayed response. You can add the dog by scrolling all the way down on the baggage page. If you still need assistance, please feel free to DM us with your itinerary number and email address on file. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N
@0hshizitsliz Hi, Liz! So sorry for any confusion. Our ticket counters do indeed open up 2 hours prior to departure time! Please feel free to DM us if you have any other questions! -N

@step42111 Hi, Stephen! We apologize for the delay in response. If you are needing assistance, please DM us with your confirmation number, your email address, and your specific request. Thank you! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N
@Debpalmer521 Hi, Deb! Sorry for the delay in response. Please DM us if you are still needing assistance with this. Thank you! -https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@kahreetoh Hi, there! We are so sorry to hear of your bag. If you have sent a message to our System Baggage Services team, they will respond. All inquiries are answered in the order received. If you have additional questions, please feel free to DM us! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

urls.title: Customer Request For Assistance | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Do you have specific travel issues? We’re here to help! Use the online form to send us a customer assistance request.

data.text: @dogs_flops Hi Lisa. Thanks for reaching out. Please file a lost luggage claim here: https://t.co/fP8K46I26K . Our System Baggage team will reach out to you via email for assistance as they are the corresponding team. -H

@WilliamLSkye Hi Will! Thanks for reaching out. We are not affiliated with third parties. Please send us a DM and the next available agent will assist. Alternatively, you can call 7025058888 to be assisted via phone by one of our Customer Care Representatives. -H

@LondonUte Hi there! Thanks for reaching out. If you are still in need of assistance, feel free to send us a DM and the next available agent will assist. Alternatively, you can call 7025058888 to be assisted via phone by one of our Customer Care Representatives. -H

 -H

@bbrownie13 Hi Barb! Thanks for reaching out. We are sorry to hear that you had a negative experience. If you are still in need of assistance, please send us a DM and the next available agent will assist. Alternatively, you can call 7025058888 to be assisted via phone. -H

@LindsayCourt21 Hi Lindsay! Thanks for reaching out. If you are still in need of assistance, feel free to send us a DM and the next available agent will assist. Alternatively, you can call 7025058888 to be assisted via phone by one of our Customer Care Representatives. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -H

urls.title: Purchase Cheap Airline Tickets at the Airport | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Last-minute travel plans? You have the option to purchase cheap airline tickets at the airport. Please note the ticket counter hours of operation.

data.text: @jfcsoup Hi Jim! Yes, absolutely. You can see what times our agents will be available for ticket sales here: https://t.co/07EkKuvRdM. We hope this helps! - GM
@sissy_1971 Any time! Have a great day. 😎 - GM
@sissy_1971 Hi Jenny! Your purchase must be $275 and travel must be between 9/7-11/16. - GM

@BrendaM57670871 Hi, Brenda! All routes are current through mid-May 2023. Flights will be shown in bold for you to select on our calendar. If a date is not shown in bold after selecting your desired origin and destination, we are not offering a flight for your route and/or date of interest. -N

@kmdevma Hi, Karissa! We are sorry to hear of your experience. If you are still in need of assistance, please feel free to DM us with your confirmation number and email address on file. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N
